skills.skill: Power Automate and Power Apps Development

duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and support SharePoint, SharePoint Online, Teams, and O365 Applications.
Build sites and pages, modify, and delete sites, manage SharePoint Permissions.
Manage SharePoint Lists and document Libraries (Filter & Sorting, Custom Views).
Create deployment strategy for SharePoint Online and Power Platform.
Design solutions based on established patterns and best practices around Content Management, SharePoint Online, and the Power Platform.
Communicate effectively with technical as well as non-technical staff.
Translate business requirements into technical solutions.
Understand Power Automate and Power Apps development methods.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Information Technology, or a related field (Master's preferred)
